definitions.definition: Capable of giving out a deep , resonant sound .
examples: The highlight of the hike was the sonorous cave, which produced a ringing echo from the hiker’s shouts.

definitions.definition: Full of sound and rich , as in language or verse .
examples: He was selected to give the opening speech thanks to his imposing, sonorous voice.

definitions.definition: Produced with a relatively open vocal tract and relatively little obstruction of airflow.

main_definition: Capable of giving out a deep , resonant sound .
secondary_definitions: Full of sound and rich , as in language or verse .
( linguistics , phonetics ) Produced with a relatively open vocal tract and relatively little obstruction of airflow.
